messages.messageBody:
Konichiwa

Lately I've been wondering about Japanese Archery. More specifically the types of bows used. I know of the Yami, but were others used. Perhaps a shorter, smaller bow: more Mongol in appearance and function. Just an example. Any information would be helpful.

Toramitsu
